column4: I just downloaded the new debian etch and was wanting to know if any of you have ran it is it ANY GOOD
yeah i am running it because it is what my box can handle at this point in time

First, God made Debian. And there was much rejoicing. Then God made Ubuntu from one of Debian's ribs. And there was much rejoicing. Sadly, the two, while similiar, do not really know what each other are thinking.
